activities_info.details: More than 100 students at the Medical University of South Carolina have signed up to provide free care to the children of health care workers during the coronavirus pandemic. More than 100 health care workers have asked for child care. Most work at MUSC Health, but the list also includes health care providers at Roper Hospital, the Ralph H. Johnson VA Medical Center and East Cooper Medical Center.

directusSchool.name: Medical University of South Carolina College of Medicine
